title: La Personne Morale Ã  Mission
original_prompt:
An isometric view of a modern corporate building structure. Instead of concrete foundations, massive, organic tree roots spread deep into the ground, forming a solid, locked base. The building has organic design elements.

Color palette: Terracotta/rust, cream, muted green

Style: Retro-futuristic isometric illustration, clean lines, diagrammatic style, vintage infographic feel.
Texture: Printed on aged, textured cream/off-white paper.
Format: Portrait aspect ratio suitable for A5 card printing.
No text, no words, no letters, no numbers on the image.
revised_prompt: Generate an isometric illustration of a modern corporate building structure, possessing a unique foundation of massive, organic tree roots burrowing deep into the ground, forming a sturdy base. This structure displays elements of organic design throughout its architecture. It should reflect the color palette of terracotta/rust, cream, and muted green. Emphasize clean lines and a vintage infographic feel to confer a retro-futuristic look. The image, suitable for portrait aspect ratio, should mimic the appearance of being printed on aged, textured cream or off-white paper. Aim for an A5 card printing size, and make sure it includes no text, words, letters, or numbers.
